dxf2svg.animation
Class SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateMotion

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.animation.SvgAnimator
      dxf2svg.animation.SvgAnimator.SvgSet
          dxf2svg.animation.SvgAnimator.SvgAnimate
              dxf2svg.animation.SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateMotion
Enclosing class:
SvgAnimator
protected final class SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateMotion
extends SvgAnimator.SvgAnimate

This class will animate an object with motion attributes. It will also animate an object along an internal path setPath(java.lang.String) or along a path reference mpath setMPath(dxf2svg.svg.SvgMPath)

Constructor Detail

SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateMotion

protected SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateMotion()
Method Detail

setPath

public void setPath(java.lang.String path)
Sets the path attribute's value. The path is the motion path of the animaiton expressed in the same manner as the 'd=' attribute on the path element. All SvgElements have methods to express themselves as paths, some are not implemented because it just didn't make any sense to. Here is a list to date:
  • SvgArc
  • SvgPolyLine
  • SvgEllipse
  • SvgHatch
  • SvgLine
  • SvgSpline

Overrides:
setPath in class SvgAnimator
Throws:
IllegalAttributeValueException - if the argument string is null. If the argument String is empty '""' then the attribute is set to its default state and will not be output.
See Also:
SvgGraphicElement.getElementAsPath(boolean)

setMPath

public void setMPath(SvgMPath mpath)
Gives the AnimateMotion object a sub element mpath object.

Overrides:
setMPath in class SvgAnimator
Parameters:
mpath - a reference to a path to animate along.

setAttributeToAnimate

public void setAttributeToAnimate(java.lang.String attrib)
Description copied from class: SvgAnimator.SvgSet
Sets the attribute you wish to animated.

Overrides:
setAttributeToAnimate in class SvgAnimator.SvgSet

setAttributeType

public void setAttributeType(java.lang.String type)
Description copied from class: SvgAnimator.SvgSet
Sets the type of attribute you would like to animate. Valid values are:
  • CSS
  • XML
  • auto (default)

Overrides:
setAttributeType in class SvgAnimator.SvgSet

setOrigin

public void setOrigin(java.lang.String origin)
Sets the origin attribute's value. The origin is a point from where you would like the animaiton to begin.

Overrides:
setOrigin in class SvgAnimator
Throws:
IllegalAttributeValueException - if the argument string is null. If the argument String is empty '""' then the attribute is set to its default state and will not be output.

setRotate

public void setRotate(java.lang.String rotate)
Sets the rotation of target animation object in relation to the path it is being animated along. Used in AnimateMotion object only.

Overrides:
setRotate in class SvgAnimator
Throws:
IllegalAttributeValueException - if the argument string is null. If the argument String is empty '""' then the attribute is set to its default state and will not be output.

getAnimationTargetAttribute

public java.lang.String getAnimationTargetAttribute()
Because AnimateMotion does not animate any host element's attribute, the return value is irrelevant and a message may be issued if the VERBOSE flag is set.

Overrides:
getAnimationTargetAttribute in class SvgAnimator.SvgSet
Returns:
SvgAnimator.NOT_APPLICABLE because the object does not support this functionality.

getAttributes

public void getAttributes(java.lang.StringBuffer buff)
Outputs the element as an attribute String instead of a discreet XML element. This method will output all relavent attributes with the exception of those that have been set to SVG's default values.

Overrides:
getAttributes in class SvgAnimator.SvgAnimate
